content.title: Now Playing Hail storm causes icy flooding 00:21 - AccuWeather.com

content.title: Incredible weather photos and how to take your own - ABC News
content.desc: Due to its size and location, Australia is home to some extremely diverse weather patterns. ABC Open contributor and avid storm photographer Jordan Cantelo lives in northern WA and travels extensively to capture the region's many spectacular weather events during wet season. Mr Cantelo said the most important advice he could give beginners was for them to be aware of their surroundings and to be safe. "Lightning is unpredictable in where it will strike and can strike a long way from the main thunderstorm," he said. "Clear air strikes (or bolts from the blue as they are commonly referred to)...

content.title: Hail on the Sand... - 500px
content.desc: ...don't let the hint of colour fool you it was still bone cold along the beach. Hail was filling the ripples on the sand and my eyes were watering.
